pkgmetadata.longdescription: Insulin Sensitivity Indices Calculator // It facilitates the calculation of 40 different insulin sensitivity indices based on fasting, oral glucose tolerance test (OGTT), lipid (adipose), and tracer (palmitate and glycerol rate) and dxa (fat mass) measurement values. It enables easy and accurate assessment of insulin sensitivity, critical for understanding and managing metabolic disorders like diabetes and obesity. Indices calculated are described in Gastaldelli (2022). doi:10.1002/oby.23503 and Lorenzo (2010). doi:10.1210/jc.2010-1144.
